How many people are affected by congenital fiber-type disproportion ?,"Congenital fiber-type disproportion is thought to be a rare condition, although its prevalence is unknown.",GHR,congenital fiber-type disproportion
What are the genetic changes related to congenital fiber-type disproportion ?,"Mutations in multiple genes can cause congenital fiber-type disproportion. Mutations in the TPM3, RYR1 and ACTA1 genes cause 35 to 50 perce
